schema.label: fetch-open-pos: Offset
schema.name: fetch_open_pos_offset
schema.hint: offset for the next 50 POs to fetch

schema.label: fetch-open-pos: Thread Number
schema.name: fetch_open_pos_thread
schema.hint: identifier for the thread so we can track its status

schema.label: fetch-po-req: Purchase Order ID
schema.name: fetch_po_req_po_id
schema.hint: ID of the PO related to the Requisition

schema.label: fetch-po-req: Requisition ID
schema.name: fetch_po_req_req_id
schema.hint: ID of the Requisition Header to fetch

schema.label: fetch-po-lines: Purchase Order ID
schema.name: fetch_po_lines_po_id
schema.hint: ID of the Purchase Order related to the PO lines

schema.label: send-open-po-report: Requisitioner Email
schema.name: send_open_po_report_email
schema.hint: email for which to send open PO report
